meanings.sent1: The pond was full of froggiest creatures hopping around.
meanings.sent2: The green color of the froggiest leaf blended perfectly with the grass.
meanings.sent3: The froggiest hat I've ever seen had bulging eyes on top.
meanings.sent4: Her croaky voice was the froggiest sound in the whole choir.
meanings.sent5: The froggiest puppet in the show had a long, sticky tongue.

meanings.definition: having the characteristics of a frog
meanings.sent1: His froggiest behavior included leaping from lily pad to lily pad.
meanings.sent2: The froggiest features of the costume were the webbed feet and bulging eyes.
meanings.sent3: She made the froggiest face by puffing out her cheeks and crossing her eyes.
meanings.sent4: The froggiest dancer in the group moved with a springy, agile grace.
meanings.sent5: The froggiest cake at the party had green frosting and candy eyes.

meanings.sent1: In the pond, the froggiest creature was the biggest bullfrog.
meanings.sent2: The froggiest toy in the store was a lifelike replica of a frog.
meanings.sent3: The froggiest costume at the party had a bumpy texture and a long tongue.
meanings.sent4: His froggiest impression made everyone laugh with its accuracy.
meanings.sent5: The froggiest statue in the garden looked so real, visitors often tried to catch it.
